svg.title: Font example
svg.desc:
There is a svg2ttf library. You have to use this deprecated syntax for it. https://www.w3.org/TR/SVGTiny12/fonts.html Current browsers do not support this anymore, but you can use an old Safari (the last one available for Windows works).
I don't like this, maybe I should have a look into svg2ttf and make it work with a more modern svg symbol syntax :).

glyph.d: M0 15 H1 V16 H0ZM7 0 H8 V1 H7ZM0 0 H1 V1 H0Z M1 1 H2 V2 H1ZM2 2 H3 V3 H2ZM3 3 H4 V4 H3Z M4 4 H5 V5 H4 M5 5 H6 V6 H5Z M6 6 H7 V7 H6ZM7 7 H8 V8 H7Z
